metadata.title: Funnytree Happy Retirement Party Backdrop Rose Gold Glitter Congrats Retire Photography Background Women Lady Pink Balloons Champagne Cake Table Decorations Banner Photo Booth Props
features: [Features] High-resolution digital print with eye-catching details and lifelike colors. Lightweight, cost-effective, tearproof, and good for one-time use.
[Applications] It can be used as a great party supply on occasions such as baby showers, bridal showers, weddings, birthdays, holidays, baptisms, graduation, and retirement, etc).
[Warm Tips] The package only contains the backdrop. Stand, clamps or props are NOT included; This backdrop is shipped folded. Roll it up tightly with a tube and wait 1-2 days to relax the creases.
description: 1. Advanced digital printing technology;  2. Eye-catching details and vibrant colors;  3. Cost-effective, lightweight, tearproof and one-time use;  4. A perfect decoration suitable for various occasions such as baby shower, bridal shower, wedding, birthday, holiday, baptism, graduation, and retirement, etc.
1. Stand, clamps or props are NOT included;  2. This backdrop is shipped folded. Roll it up tightly with a tube and wait 1-2 days to relax the creases.
